name: Maui
short_description:
Maui is a desktop operating system built on the GNU/Linux stack with a new lightweight and fast Wayland desktop environment written with QtQuick and deeply integrated with systemd.
Maui deliver incremental and atomic updates which gives users to ability to rollback the whole system to a known good state if a regression happens.
summary: Wayland/QtQuick based OS with incremental updates and bundles
